the act of including someone or something in a larger group or set, or the fact of being included in one
His inclusion in the team has caused controversy.
photos chosen for inclusion in the magazine
the inclusion of early recordings on the CD
someone or something that has been included in a larger group
With the recent inclusions, there will be 28 delegates in all.
the act of including something as part of a larger amount or group of things
the inclusion of cash flow information
The agency is still reviewing two other widely used ingredients for possible inclusion in the ban.
